title: Rent an amazing 1 bed 1 bath – Close to transit and bus lines!
posting_body: ['Pavilion Place', '5402 Renwick Dr', 'Houston, TX 77081', 'A wonderful home in Houston is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous 1 bedroom 1 bathroom renting for $925 per month.', 'This unit comes with 701 sq ft.', '**Choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'Pavilion Place in Houston, TX is pet friendly and offers one and two bedroom apartment homes for rent with convenient shopping and dining close to The Galleria.', 'Our apartments feature large walk-in closets, washers/dryers available and intrusion alarms.', 'Our community offers a fitness center and six swimming pools.', 'Located in Southwest Houston, Pavilion Place is easily accessible to Hwy 59.', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL>', 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:',
